definition[0]: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil
definition[1]: the young form of an insect, which looks like a short worm
definition[2]: someone who you do not like or respect
definition[3]: a type of computer virus that can make copies of itself and destroy information on computers that are connected to each other
definition[4]: to give an animal medicine in order to remove parasites that live inside it
definition[5]: a CD on which information can be stored only once, but seen or used many times
